sentences.en: "You know who Diana was, Grandfather."— 'So I do!'
sentences.cn: “爷爷，您知道戴安娜是谁吧？”——“我当然知道！”

sentences.en: A grandfather clock ticked away in a corner.
sentences.cn: 一只落地式大摆钟在墙角嘀嗒作响。

sentences.en: Adam spent a lot of time in his grandfather's office.
sentences.cn: 亚当经常呆在他祖父的办公室里。

sentences.en: Bratby's grandfather had been artistically inclined.
sentences.cn: 布拉特比的祖父很有艺术天分。

sentences.en: Charles displays unreserved admiration for his grandfather.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯从不掩饰他对祖父的景仰。

sentences.en: Grandfather set them up in a liquor business.
sentences.cn: 爷爷资助他们经营酒业。

sentences.en: He sat listening to the tick of the grandfather clock.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿，听着落地式大摆钟嘀嗒作响。

sentences.en: He was an admirer of her grandfather's paintings.
sentences.cn: 他非常欣赏她祖父的画作。

sentences.en: Her great-grandfather had clearly been a dedicated and stoical traveller.
sentences.cn: 她的曾祖父显然是一位非常投入而且坚忍不拔的旅行爱好者。

sentences.en: Her maternal grandfather was Mayor of Karachi.
sentences.cn: 她的外公是卡拉奇市的市长。

sentences.en: His grandfather is always carping  about the young.
sentences.cn: 他的祖父总是指摘青年人不懂事。

sentences.en: His grandfather lies in the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 他祖父葬于教堂的墓地。

sentences.en: His grandfather roamed over the earthquake in Tangshan for a long time.
sentences.cn: 他的祖父东拉西扯地谈了半天唐山的地震。

sentences.en: I had a close relationship with my grandfather.
My grandfather was secretary of the Scottish Miners' Union.
sentences.cn: 我的祖父是苏格兰矿工工会干事。

sentences.en: My great-grandfather made horseshoes and nails and what have you.
sentences.cn: 我曾祖父打制马掌、铁钉等诸如此类的东西。

sentences.en: My great-grandfather was a person of some importance here.
sentences.cn: 我曾祖父曾是这儿的头面人物。

trans.tran_en: the father of your father or mother
the father of your father or mother
